name: endangeredSpecies
description: # Task List - [ ] git clone https://github.com/phil-krull/endangeredSpecies.git - [ ] npm install - [ ] Create angular project and set express static to serve it - [ ] Create a Angular service to send the Http request to the express server - [ ] Create 3 service methods     - GetAnimals()         - Retrieve all animals     - AddAnimal()         - Create new animal     - ShowAnimal(id: number)         - Show one animal - [ ] Add methods in Component  - [ ] Diplay All Animals in HTML - [ ] Create HTML to add a new animal - [ ] Show one Animal when Show button in selected
